name: Morshu's shop
description:
Lamp oil, rope, bombs, you want it?

In this game you play as the infamous shop owner and part-time beatboxer Morshu, and your objective is to sell 50 items to Link so he runs out of rupees and you end up rich. (Play with audio for a more immersive experience)

This was the second game that i made and it's already way more polished than the first one Sonic eats a lemon, so i was very happy with my evolution. Also it's pretty funny.

I did take all the assets from google (some i altered in some way but still), so my journey to become a fully-equiped game dev is still in the very beggining.
